org.jclouds.slicehost.domain
Class Slice

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.slicehost.domain.Slice

public class Slice
extends Object

A slice is a virtual machine instance in the Slicehost system. Flavor and image are requisite elements when creating a slice.

Author:
Adrian Cole
